ygData.subject: Re: EQ marriage
ygData.msgSnippet: Congratulations! Unfortunately, Mystic Alliance on RN has scheduled a guild meeting/lotto/raffle/Arenadeathmatch for the same day. :( I m sure some of us would
ygData.messageBody:
Congratulations! Unfortunately, Mystic Alliance on RN has scheduled a
guild meeting/lotto/raffle/Arenadeathmatch for the same day. :( I'm
sure some of us would have been happy to create 'event-mules' on
Nameless for the joyous occasion if we had been free. I hope that
everyone has a wonderful time, & the couple enjoys their honeymoon. ;)

--- In EQ_rainbow@y..., Terry Walker <mellowtigger@m...> wrote:
> There will be an EQ marriage this coming Sunday, February 4th, at
3pm Eastern
> time on The Nameless server. The marriage will be between members
of sister
> guilds, Nameless Love and The Nameless Of Mercy.
>
> The husbands-to-be include Ashkevron Moonchant from the guild of the
Nameless
> Love and Qshanaot Moonchant from the guild of The Nameless Of Mercy.
>
> Contact either participant for more information (like location/zone
on the
> server?) or the wedding officiant, Mater Azura.
>
> original post at http://www.namelesslove.com/bbbb.php?request=214
>
> - SoulDreamer, guildleader of Nameless Love, http://www.namelesslove.com
